1.0.name: wordpress/fluid-accessible-sorting-portlet
1.0.description: Fluid Accessible Sorting Portlet is a sorting portlet of your blogs recent posts, recent comments, categories and meta and uses the Fluid WAI-ARIA enabled sorting list. Use it in a wide widget area, like the "First Footer Widget Area" of the "Twenty Ten" theme.
